author: Special Correspondent
text:
A four-year-old girl travelling on a motorcycle died in a road accident after the two-wheeler rammed a stationary private bus at Nochiyam pudhu palam bus stop on the city’s outskirts on Friday.

Police gave the name of the dead as V. Kanishka of Thiruthalaiyur.

The girl’s uncle M. Sukiraman was riding the two-wheeler with Kaniska seated on the front and her grandmother M. Kannagi riding pillion.

Police said the motorcycle rammed a stationary private bus from behind and all three fell down from the two-wheeler.

The girl sustained head injury and died of it at the Government Hospital in Tiruchi a few hours later. The Mannachanallur police are investigating.
title: 4-year-old girl dies in accident
